channel.title: terraform on cmdlineonly
channel.description: Recent content in terraform on cmdlineonly

item.title: Passing the Terraform Certified Associate
item.description: I just recently passed the Terraform Associate exam. I wanted to share my experience on what I thought about the exam, as well as the study material I used. I didn’t have any background in using Terraform up until a couple months ago. It looked like an interesting tool for expanding my IaC which was previously limited to mostly Ansible. I started looking into it and really enjoyed the way infrastructure was defined using HCL.
